name: Feathers of Investment
description:
Game made for the 2021 Hacktudo GameJam called Gamethon.

Game where you controll your player and take down other enemies. With the money of each enemy killed you can either buy new weapons or try to invest in getting more money. 

Team:

Bruno Zander - 3D Artist

Guilherme Cicco - Game Designer

Giovanni Garritano - 3D Artist

Matheus França - Programmer

Link to the repertoire: https://github.com/matefranca/Gamethon2021
